name: LD36 - Ancient Fire Clicker
description:
Ludum Dare 36 72JAM Entry "Ancient Fire Clicker"

Ancient Fire Clicker:

Our take on clickers for this Jam, a short clicker about fire.

Controls:

Mouse: Left-Click on stuff.

Bugs:

- Fullscreen: don't do it. The mouse don't work when you do that.

Stephen Ma (@tehPHEN)
